description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Sutton's Hospital, The Charterhouse, 15, Charterhouse Square, Islington, Islington, London, EC1M 6AX

TPO Reference
T15 - Fig of LBI TPO (No.367) 2007

PO Number
TO80119

Work specifications
1 x Fig (T15) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.367) 2007Fell to ground level, remove stump and replace with Like for Like replacement in the centre of the planting bed.

Decision:
Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions:
Condition:

The authority expects to see a replacement Fruiting Fig tree planted in a similar location as discussed on site within one season of removal, positioning shall be within the same planting bed as the tree consented for removal, but, located in a more central; position further from the historic wall.  A plan of the location of the replacement location shall be submitted to the authority for updating the Statutory Register.
